text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, over here～. We're already connected to El.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sorry for the wait～! Hello, El-chan!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: 『Oh, Spe-chan has arrived, huh?』

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Bonjooour～! Everyone seems to be doing well! Of course, El is doing well tooooo!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, your 『Spring Tenno Sho』 was great! Sei-chan, it was a nice run too!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: 『But well～, Spe-chan really got me good though～』

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: 『Because of that, ever since then, I haven't been able to sleep well at night. Because of that, I'm always really sleepy during class』

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: 『Eeh～～!? I-is that true!?』

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: 『Isn't sleeping in class normal for Sky-san?』

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: 『They got mad at me for sleeping in class too…… The class before was in the pool, so I ended up using all of my strength there……』

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ahahaa! Everyone seems like their usual self, huh～.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: El-chan, it's amazing that you've won a G1 overseas! Even on the news over here, El-chan is the hot topic!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: 『Fufuun, so this must be what it feels like to be famous, huh!? But, these results aren't enough to satisfy El!』

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: 『I'm aiming for proof that I'm the world's strongest! Conquering a big race that no Japanese Uma Musume has won before――』

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: 『Victory at the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe, I'll show you that I'll definitely be the one to do it!』

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! We'll be cheering for you too!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: It won't be just us either. Everyone in Japan will be cheering El on.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: As a close friend, and a rival that I can take pride in, I'm expecting a wonderful race from you.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: 『I'm expecting great things from your efforts too～! And then someday, let's promise to have another battle!』

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……Yes, once more for sure.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Alright, now it's King's turn to talk!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait, I'm next in line though, right?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Aaah!? Me too!! Me too!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……El-chan.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: They round the 4th corner in to the straight! This year's Derby Uma Musume, Special Week, quickly moves to the outside!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Special Week, it's Special Week! The Senior class dignified "Empress" Air Groove also moves forward!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: But it's El Condor, El Condor! El Condor Pasa takes the lead and crosses the goal!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Seems like there was nothing to worry about when it comes to distance! El Condor Pasa, part of the Classic Class, magnificiently conquers the 『Japan Cup』!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa……Haaa……! Haaa……!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Haa……fuu……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ……That was an awesome, heated race, Spe-chan!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa…… Haa…… Ehehe, yeah!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (In last year's 『Japan Cup』―― El-chan was really amazing……)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (That a race could be this amazing, and that I could take on an even bigger challenge. It feels like she taught me that……)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (Just watching her makes me excited…… and that's why everyone has big expectation of El-chan)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: (……me too. I want to be an Uma Musume like that……!)
The first half of the Twinkle Series culminates with the 『Takarazuka Kinen』――
With that grand stage approaching, Special Week's training intensified.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Daaa～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Fuu～……3 laps on the dirt, finished! Trainer-san, which type of training is next!?
Alright, let's try slope running next. Focus on not losing any speed, even with the additional burden on your body.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Alright, I'll get started then!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Seems like Special Week-san is really motivated.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: First in fan votes……it just hit me but, even with that she seems to be fine.
Of course I'm being careful so she doesn't get too excited, but it's still a good thing. It seems like she's really fulfilled.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Fulfilled is it……?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Like when we were planning for the 『Spring Tenno Sho』, doing trial and error with Trainer-san, it kind of reminds me of that same feeling.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The feeling of "Chasing your dreams", maybe Special Week-san is feeling that right now.
Chasing your dreams, huh……
Alright, let's end today's training here.
Alright, let's end today's training here.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Okaaaay! Good work out there!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That said, today you were awesome out there, Spe-chan! Fighting spirit at max～ or something, it was rough keeping up with you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, it kind of felt like the power just kept welling up from inside my body!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: With the way Spe-san is right now, it seems like it'll be a good run at the 『Takarazuka Kinen』……!
Yeah, let's end spring in the best possible way!
Yeah, let's end spring in the best possible way!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah, um……Trainer-san! Actually, I have a request!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Right now, with Suzuka-san running in America, and El-chan running in France, lots of people are cheering them on, right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: As Japanese Uma Musume, as representatives of Japan as they challenge the world, they're shouldering the expectations of all the fans in Japan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Up until now, I was talking about how I thought aiming to be "An Uma Musume that could make everyone smile" would bring me closer to being "Japan's #1", but―

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It seems more like Suzuka-san and El-chan are doing what I'm aiming for.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Carrying the expectations of so many people, and responding to those expectations, I want to be an Uma Musume like that too so, if I win the 『Takarazuka Kinen』――

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Just like El-chan, I want to challenge the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 too!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』!? Spe-chan will……!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Is that why you've been so motivitated?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah……!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, just like when you first joined the team, your goals are still just as big, Special Week-san.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: W-what do you think…… Trainer-san!
My reaction was the same as the other team members', unable to hide my surprise at Special Week's words.
However, her eyes were serious, her strong desire to chase her dream to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume" was conveyed properly――
With a dream that big, you need to be prepared for the steps to be just as big, you said that before, didn't you Spe?
With a dream that big, you need to be prepared for the steps to be just as big, you said that before, didn't you Spe?
Shouldering all those expectations, and then becoming an Uma Musume that can live up to them…… In that case, you need to show them an even greater run.
Shouldering all those expectations, and then becoming an Uma Musume that can live up to them…… In that case, you need to show them an even greater run.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: By that, you mean……!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Waa……! Yeah!!
Shouldering everyone's expectations, and wanting to become an Uma Musume that can live up to those expectations――
A 『Takarazuka Kinen』 with an overseas trip on the line, Special Week now had an extraordinary ambition to pour her all in to.
